wordpressPost.title: Another failed facial smoothing product bought on Instagram
wordpressPost.content:
Another failed facial smoothing product bought on Instagram

The box and directions say that it’s for the following:

  1.  Lightens skin.
  2. Improves crows feet.
  3. Is antibacterial.
  4. Is pulsating.  I didn’t feel that.
  5. Is a form of Acupuncture (not even close).

Did not do anything but make sounds!
